name: Genovieve Fiaseu
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
To Whom It May Concern,

My name is Genovieve, preferably known as Mai, and I would love the opportunity to show that I am a great addition to the team! Customer service is my expertise and medical marijuana is an industry that I feel most passionate about. I’m excited about the rapid growth of this industry and want nothing more than to be apart of it. I’m a fast learner and love to ask questions to become a more knowledgeable employee. I'm currently working in an Optometrists office and would love to switch to something a little more exciting! I have basic knowledge in flower and have had plenty experiences with edibles to be able to determine a safe dosage. Looking forward for the chance to sit down and speak further about the many possibilities!

Thank you for your time,

Genovieve Mai Fiaseu

additionalInfo: I currently work in an Optometrists office so I check patients in and collect payment on their way out. I have a clear understanding of HIPAA guidelines and customer service is a strong suit for me.
